list.name: LAMP-BLOWOUT
list.description: All enemies close to Gene are instantly pushed back. If at least one enemy Brawler is within range, Gene will also restore x% of his max health.
list.descriptionHtml: All enemies close to Gene are instantly pushed back. If at least one enemy Brawler is within range, Gene will also restore x% of his max health.

list.name: VENGEFUL-SPIRITS
list.description: Gene shoots a homing missile at all visible opponents within a large area, dealing up to x damage based on distance.
list.descriptionHtml: Gene shoots a homing missile at all visible opponents within a large area, dealing up to x damage based on distance.
